update.description:
This requires [this](https://bitbucket.org/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/pull-requests/125/backport-from-default-to-ign-math2-and-fix/diff) ign-math pull request to use `ignition::math::Triangle3d`.

After this, the only gazebo::math left in gui is in deprecated functions.
update.title: More ign-math in gazebo::gui

content.raw: No test failures, only cppcheck warnings.

content.raw: this function might be constable too
I think this could be a `static` function, or at least `const` since it doesn't touch any member variables
content.html: I think this could be a static function, or at least const since it doesn't touch any member variables

content.raw:
It fails with 
~~~
No rule to make target `/usr/local/Cellar/ignition-math2/2.5.0/lib/libignition-math2.dylib', needed by `gazebo/util/libgazebo_util.8.0.0.dylib'.  Stop.
~~~
content.html:
It fails with

content.html: We need to rebuild the ignition-msgs bottle too. I'm going to try to add a better test too

content.raw:
I see this build warning:

```
#!c++

/data/gazebo_pr_2436/test/integration/undo.cc: In member function ‘void UndoTest::UndoSnap()’:
/data/gazebo_pr_2436/test/integration/undo.cc:562:13: warning: ‘void gazebo::gui::ModelSnap::Snap(const std::vector<gazebo::math::Vector3>&, const std::vector<gazebo::math::Vector3>&, gazebo::rendering::VisualPtr)’ is deprecated [-Wdeprecated-declarations]
       boxVis);
             ^
In file included from /data/gazebo_pr_2436/test/integration/undo.cc:26:0:
/data/gazebo_pr_2436/gazebo/gui/ModelSnap.hh:72:20: note: declared here
       public: void Snap(const std::vector<math::Vector3> &_triangleSrc,

```
